overview:
Alain is a member of SAP SIP Architecture Council where he executes architecture governance for Service Industry Platform (SIP) research and development group.

He also act as development architect into implementation of SAP HANA (In-memory) technology into CRM suite software landscape.

He actively contributed to the definition of SAP architecture and programming standard guidelines. Reviewed architecture concept documents of SIP development projects. Reviewed deviation and exception request to SAP Standard Product Innovation Life Cycle. And continuously acting as central point of contact between SIP and SAP office of CTO, were he ensured leadership, support and appliance of SAP goals.

With more than 11 years in software development, Alain is a strategic thinker with proven ability to drive product strategy and lead large global / cross-functional teams.

He posses a deep experience in designing, developing and delivering large scale complex enterprise software. He participated in the architecture (TPM, Funds, ICM, Middleware, Grantor, Vendavo integration, …) elaboration and software design/implementation of world class leading CRM solution at SAP since the first release and still contribute to the latest innovation (HANA In-Memory appliance).

He is also an innovative thinker and own the patent US-2010-0161397 (mobile recycling solution).
